ARABIC: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We did not create heaven and earth and everything in between them as a game.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have not created the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, out of fun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We did not create in sport the heavens and the earth and all that lies between the two.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We did not create the heavens and the earth just for fun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, unnecessarily.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We created not the heavens and the earth and all that is between them for play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and what is between them for sport.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We created not the heaven and the earth, and whatsoever between them is, as playing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We created not the heaven and the earth and all that is between them in play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It was not in play that We created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We created not the heaven and the earth and that which is in between in play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not create the sky and the earth and whatever is between them for play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not for (idle) sport did We create the heavens and the earth and all that is between!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We created not the heavens and the earth and all that is between them for a (mere) play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was not in play that We created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We did not create the sky and the earth and what is between them for amusement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:16] And We did not create the heaven and the earth and all that is between them, playing, being frivolous, but to indicate Our power and to benefit Our servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We created not the heaven and the earth and all that is between them) of created beings (in play) without ordaining commands and prohibitions.
